name: ECwid Store(2024)
description: Helped a private client launch their brand on Ecwid, building a seamless eCommerce presence for their life-hack product line from the ground up.

name: Endura Brand Website (2018)
description: Developed the company website for Endura Tools in 2018. Established in 1998, Endura Tools provides industry-leading support tools widely used across mining, automotive, engineering, and home applications.

name: Klauke Brand Online Stores CN(2018)
description: Founded in 1879, the German brand Klauke is renowned for its high-quality tools and electrical connection technology, specializing in crimping, cutting, and punching solutions. Klauke and Endura share the same headquarters; however, in July 2018, Klauke was acquired by the EMERSON Group.

name: FMCG eCommerce landing pages - Wyeth (2015-2017)
description: Wyeth, founded in 1860, is a globally recognized brand in the FMCG sector, renowned for its premium nutrition and consumer healthcare products. From 2015 to 2017, I contributed to Wyethâ€™s eCommerce growth by developing and optimizing landing pages to enhance user engagement and online sales.

name: FMCG eCommerce landing pages - Milk (2015-2017)
description: Served client Friesche Vlag from 2016 to 2017, managing monthly online campaigns to enhance brand engagement and digital presence.

name: Mobile pages (2015-2017)
description: few demos for eCommerce mobile landing pages.
